Regarding red star on LK, apparently, this is really a political thing, since that symbol is somewhere restricted, what I found on Wiki:

This image contains symbols use of which may be illegal in Hungary (except under certain restrictions; Hungarian Criminal Code 269/B.Ã‚Â§ 1993), Indonesia, Latvia, Lithuania, Poland, and Ukraine, depending on context.

Really weird, it's not hammer and a sickle with a strong political meaning, IMO.

Regarding red star on LK, apparently, this is really a political thing, since that symbol is somewhere restricted, what I found on Wiki:

Really weird, it's not hammer and a sickle with a strong political meaning, IMO.

So I've got Hungarian KSP player's arrested?

I better remove it!

Edit: Switched to Blu star.

Edited April 2, 2015 by Beale
Making Tantares not illegal.
How backwards! The red star isn't even a Soviet symbol, it represents socialism in general!

From my, Croatian observations (we have some... special people here aswell asking for banning of the red star, hammer and sickle etc...), I'd say it's the usual post-WW2 martyr-complex causing this, it's typical for Poland, Croatia, Finland...

Probably why its contextually illegal. i.e. you could probably use it in a history book or in a game which has historical recreation elements or just as a red star. But putting it up as the background for a political advert or during a public protest may result in a visit from unsympathetic people with truncheons
IMO a green star would be more Kerbal.

I hope my RSSA will be not considered political, since it has Red Star on its name.

BTW, guys, what are your opinions on this logo/flag for it?

I hope my RSSA will be not considered political, since it has Red Star on its name.

BTW, guys, what are your opinions on this logo/flag for it?

http://i.imgur.com/As4uB03.png

That's... er... pretty freakin' cool.

This is yours? Am I allowed to use that?

Also...

Tantares 20!

Includes symmetrical Soyuz RPM setup, I chose to leave it as it is, as I would like to take a second shot at the Neptune, which will take a little while longer!

I could have saved version 20 for something a little more... amazing, but eh.

Actually a small art pass to Progress which I didn't mention yet. Mainly just cleaned some of the 'harsher' parts of the textures.

Well after add both RLA stockalike and Procedural Fairings, i got the mod working! Word of advice though, Please tell people who are downloading the craft files and this that they need the 2 mods i mentioned.
Sweet! I already had a few other ideas where to use that new windowless capsule. Goodbye sleep and hello VAB fun.

Try adding procedural fairings too

(and check you haven't pruned anything from stock - the shenzou wanted one of the stock nosecones)

Thanks so much for the help, because of the mention of Procedural fairings and RLA stockalike, i got the mod working!

So, will we start putting a veil on the female kerbals because depicting females without veils is forbidden in some countries?

Is this really the place to cater to or discuss censorship?

They are not humans, so it's ok.

But jokes aside, I think it might be made optional, like, a personal folder in "Alternative Textures", but keeping it in main might cause some discontent, like it happened several pages ago. For my personal opinion, it's ok, well, not like USSR exists anymore, but since there are complaints...

If you need, a version for an EVA flag with "wear&tear".

http://i.imgur.com/NSfDgsh.png

This will be cool too!

So, will we start putting a veil on the female kerbals because depicting females without veils is forbidden in some countries?

Is this really the place to cater to or discuss ridiculous censorship laws in some countries?

I do know where you're coming from.

But, Hungary is right on a lot of our doorsteps, I've been to Budapest a couple of times, I can be absolutely sure there are a lot of KSP players from the country (In fact I think I see a few on the forums). Wouldn't want to risk any repercussions for them over something silly, whatever small chance.

It's different than say removing a symbol because it's banned in North Korea.

Might as well put the issue to rest and remove it, eh?

Edit: Oh, it isn't just Hungary, I mis-read. Even more reason.

Well after add both RLA stockalike and Procedural Fairings, i got the mod working! Word of advice though, Please tell people who are downloading the craft files and this that they need the 2 mods i mentioned.

But jokes aside, I think it might be made optional, like, a personal folder in "Alternative Textures", but keeping it in main might cause some discontent, like it happened several pages ago. For my personal opinion, it's ok, well, not like USSR exists anymore, but since there are complaints...

I do agree with you, but, I'll be electric and follow the path of least resistance

I don't feel so strongly about the star staying or leaving.

Alternative textures might work.

Now some folks want "kerbalized" versions of Earth flags and so forth, but I don't really - and it seemed to my eye to "jump out" as a known symbol. I still prefer my proposal:
